data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Garai-Gyulai, Adrienne, Ünal, Mustafa (2014): A new Bradyporus Charpentier, 1825 species from Iran (Orthoptera, Bradyporinae). Zootaxa 3814 (2): 275-282, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3814.2.7
